title: Single Page TableGrid
description: Single page table grid with backend data. All options are configrable such as edit, delete, view only, report, search, shuffle and refresh. And dynamic validation for email, username, number and etc developed in 2006.

title: Single Page Application
description: Single page application page navigations are handled using AJAX and developed in 2006. Data's are stored in msql dababase when user navigate to the page the request will send to backend using AJAX and PHP script will read the request and connect database to pull respective data then will send as response. JavaScript will append in the specified element whenever receive the response from AJAX call.
env: JavaScript, AJAX, HTML, CSS, jQuery, PHP, MYSQL
